item.title: Jenna Ortega and Elle Fanning for Variety’s ACTORS ON ACTORS
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Jenna Ortega says ‘WEDNESDAY’ season 2 will “lean into the horror more.”
“We’re ditching any romantic love interest, which is really great. We’re going to get bolder, more dark.”
(https://variety.com/2023/tv/features/jenna-ortega-elle-fanning-social-media-bad-auditions-1235631696/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Jenna Ortega on social media:
“It's such a hard thing to balance. How do you be honest without jeopardizing your own health and safety? It's very easy to feel out of control.”
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
‘BLACK MIRROR’ creator Charlie Brooker toyed with ChatGPT by having it write an episode of the series which, according to him, was “sh-t.”
“All it’s done is look up all the synopses of [other] episodes & mush them together… there’s not actually any real original thought here.”
item.author: FilmUpdates
